ComicInfo.Summary: Anna Mercury is back in this summer's biggest epic! Warren Ellis' fiery red-head returns to once again explode into mad science-fiction action with the stellar art of Facundo Percio, returning from the smash-hit original series! Anna Mercury is wounded and trapped in the security ministry of Three Souls Town, a city hanging in the weird Constellation outside the universe itself. She thinks they're insane, they think she's an agent of destruction. Neither of them realize something worse is on the way: ULTRASPACIAL DREADNOUGHT VANAHEIM and Space Vikings! This series rockets into stores with a Regular cover by Paul Duffield, Wraparound by Juan Jose Ryp, and Painted by Felipe Massafera.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-08 09:47:26. [CVDB176012]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Digikore Studios, Felipe Massafera, Juan Jose Ryp, Michael DiPascale, Paul Duffield, Richard Ortiz
